status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: The java-jars task has a list of artifacts to upload, the JDBC driver needs to be included there: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/7cfdfbb0d5472f8f8893398b51042a3ca1dd0adf/dev/tasks/tasks.yml#L816-L820
fields.summary: [Packaging] Add JDBC driver to release tasks
